thread.title: DPSDave.com Wins Annual Best of Corvallis Award
thread.title_full: DPSDave.com Wins Annual Best of Corvallis Award - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DPSDave.com Wins Annual Best of Corvallis Award
text:
DPSDave.com chosen for the annual Best of Corvallis Award Program on September 30 for their continued excellence in customer service and serving the Corvallis community.
Philomath, OR (PRWEB) October 23, 2015
On September 30, DPSDave.com, LLC received the 2015 Best of Corvallis Award.
Since its inception, the Corvallis Award Program seeks out and awards companies they feel exemplify both outstanding marketing success in the Corvallis community and in the business world. Additionally, the award program recognizes the businesses in Corvallis that demonstrate community excellence and that work to enhance Corvallis as a community.
These companies help to make the Corvallis area a great place to live, work, and play.
DPSDave.com has been selected for the 2015 Best of Corvallis Award in the Business Services category by the Corvallis Award Program.
The Corvallis Award program used third party information to discern and select the winners for each category. For the awards, quality is always favored over quantity. Winners are determined based on the information gathered both internally by the Corvallis Award program and data gathered and provided by outside sources, creating a comprehensive and well-rounded means of determining the business leaders of excellence in Corvallis.
The Corvallis Award Program is an annual awards program that honors the achievements and accomplishments of local businesses throughout the Corvallis area. The award program works exclusively with local businesses, trade groups, professional associations, and other business advertising and marketing groups, with a mission to recognize how small businesses and communities contribute to the U.S. economy.
DPSDave.com was selected due to their demonstrated ability to use their best practices and implemented programs to generate competitive advantages and long-term value.
David Orr, President of DPSDave.com, is honored to have received this award for their photo scanning service company.
"We've only just begun, and we have lots of hard work in front of us, and this award encourages us to strive for greater levels of service."
Orr adds, "I want to thank our employees and contractors for the talent, dedication, and imagination as we build this business into everything it can be."
About DPSDave.com
DPSDave.com, LLC can help with a variety of photographic needs, namely photo scanning and slide scanning services. They can scan to economy, high definition, or presentation quality. DPSDave.com can do amazing things with fade restoration, resolution, and dynamic range. To learn more about their services, visit http://www.dpsdave.com .
